my favorite band is dream theater.

content.text: Hey! I saw on your profile you've been to London. How did you like it?
It was great! I really enjoyed it. I went to a lot of museums and art galleries. It was a lot of walking, but it was worth it.
That's so cool! I'd love to go to London one day. Do you have any other travel plans?
Not right now, but I'm always looking for new places to go. I've been wanting to go to Japan for a while now.
Japan would be amazing! I've always wanted to go there too. What do you want to see in Japan?
I want to see all the temples and shrines. I'm also really interested in the food.
The food there looks amazing! I'm sure you'll love it. Do you like writing?
I love writing! It's my passion. I'm actually a writer.
That's so cool! What do you write?
I write short stories and novels. I'm working on a novel right now.
That's awesome! I'd love to read it when you're done.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's finished.
